Instrument.name: The Dust Particle Counter and Mass Analyzer (DUCMA) for Vega 1
Instrument.description: The Dust Particle Counter and Mass Analyzer (DUCMA) instruments on Vega 1 and Vega 2 were identical. The instrument consisted of a polyvinylidene flouride (PVDF) film and electronics to measure the resulting pulse heights and accumulate pulse counts that exceeded four different threshold levels ranging from 1.5x10^-13g to 4.0x10^-8g. The instrument included an anticoincidence detector mounted perpendicular to the arrival direction of the dust particles.
